channel.description: Resources Slides Networking, Web & Email from Ubuntu Networking from Ubuntu Server Guide Internet and Networking from Ubuntu UFW (Uncomplicated Firewall) from Ubuntu GUFW (Graphical Interface for UFW) from Ubuntu Video Script In this last video on Ubuntu, weâ€™ll discuss some important security and networking details needed to finish getting your VMs set up and configured properly.
